comment: /**  * Set buffer that can be read via the InputStream interface and reset the input stream.  * This has the same effect as creating a new ByteArrayInputStream with a new buffer.  *  * @param buf the new buffer to read.  */
code: /**  * Set buffer that can be read via the InputStream interface and reset the input stream.  * This has the same effect as creating a new ByteArrayInputStream with a new buffer.  *  * @param buf the new buffer to read.  */ public void setBuffer(byte[] buf) {     this.buf = buf.     this.pos = 0.     this.count = buf.length. }
